head.title: Melvin's Blog
head.description: For now Phenomic does not provide a native way to extend themes but since it's based on React and uses a component approach, it's prettyâ€¦

body: For now Phenomic does not provide a native way to extend themes but since it's based on React and uses a component approach, it's pretty easy to make your own reusable collection of layouts and components.
